Yet another man.

Hi, I am @huxpro (Huang, Xuan), a software engineer & a designer. I previously worked as Web Front-End Engineer at Alibaba Trip; Web Front-End Infrastructure Team Lead at Wepiao.com; And Invited Consultant on PWA at Ele.me.

I studied Digital Media Art and graduated from Communication University of China by 2016, and am studying Computer Science at Rochester Institute of Technology from 2017.
